meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the lesson comprehensively to ensure everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: She read the book comprehensively, absorbing every detail.
meanings.sent3: The detective searched the crime scene comprehensively, even checking under the smallest objects.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was so comprehensive that she adopted every stray she found.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the landscape comprehensively, capturing every tree and cloud with precision.

meanings.definition: Including all or nearly all elements or aspects
meanings.sent1: The report was comprehensively researched, leaving no stone unturned.
meanings.sent2: He answered all the questions comprehensively, demonstrating his knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The chef's menu was so comprehensive that it included dishes from every cuisine.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of stamps was comprehensive, spanning countries from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The map was drawn comprehensively, showing every road and landmark in detail.
